title: Admission or establishment of new States.
text: Parliament may by law admit into the Union, or establish, new States on such terms & conditions as it thinks fit.
summary: Empowers Parl to admit territories that were hitherto not part of the Union. Interesetingly, this has perhaps been invoked just once, for the admission of Chandernagore into WB in 1954. Other admissions were made via diff CAAs
